main event: A witness reported seeing a satellite-like object maneuvering in the sky over Bakersville, North Carolina.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on April 12, 1958, observed around 1:02 PM., The object was described as a brilliantly lit globe, moving slowly before shooting off in a straight line., Several residents reported seeing the same object at the same time., The witness noted the object's strange configuration and motion, which was unlike anything they had seen before., The object appeared much larger than any stars in the sky.
sighted object: a satellite-like object or brilliantly lit globe
witness description: A resident who observed the object and reported it to the authorities.
